name: SHAFT (GMTK Game Jam 2020)
description: Uh oh, the cable to your mine elevator just broke! Down into the mine, you go! See if you can slow down (left stick UP, or up arrow key) enough to grab some coal for your rocket. Then, see if you can shoot back up (A button, or left-Ctrl key) to the surface. But be careful -- don't go too slow next to the scorpions and the ladybugs -- or you'll be dead!
